name: It's your turn to hide
description:
" Today was a great day, we played hide and seek with my friends, that was so fun ! 
I wonder what surprises await me tomorrow. "

This is our entry for the LvlUp Game Jam 2021:

  • Team: Austrian Kangaroo
  • People: Florian Rieder, Sebastien Rieder, Noé Aubert, Zacharie Tevaearai, Sacha André 
  • Base controls :
    A - D to move
    E to interact and move forward in dialogs
    Space to throw rocks towards your mouse pointer
  • The challenges taken were "story driven" and "retro"
  • Known glitches:
    Sometimes you get stuck behind cover
  • The background might be too small on large resolution screens
